entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
